title: Primary lateral sclerosis associated with PSEN1 Pro284Leu variant in a Colombian family: Clinical and neuropathological features
details: J Acosta‐Uribe, A Villegas‐Lanau, D Vallejo… - Alzheimer's & Dementia
abstract: INTRODUCTION This study investigates primary lateral sclerosis (PLS) as a rare manifestation of the presenilin 1 (PSEN1) NM_000021 c. 851C> T p. Pro284Leu variant in three siblings of a Colombian family, outlining its clinical and …
